reviews.review: This is a classic nd really fun to play, however, if you don't have prime statuss enabled, you are going to encounter atleast 1 cheater in every game, so i would suggest buying the dlc or playing the game only against bots.
я узнал где работает моя мама. хорошая игра топ за свои деньги
dont ban me with the fucking reason of connection problems fucKING SHIT!!!!!!

Do not get this game....... unless....

Let me explain, yes the game is free. It has provided me with hours and I mean hours of fun, right around 2.7k hours to be exact. 

This game was fun way before it was free....

But now, it is filled with cheaters. People who are using spin bots. I have play about 7 games in a row and each one had cheaters on both teams. 

Valve claims to have an anti-cheat system. They do not or its not very good. 

Sure, you can report people, but it does nothing. 

So why I said you shouldn't get this game unless..... Well unless you want to cheat.
Пукан от неё из-за читеров горит знатно,но я не сдаюсь и продолжаю играть
dont ever buy no skins from the csgo market
Polecam tego allegrowicza. Potrzebne duzo FPS.

The community is great. I've learnt a lot of new things like:  ~swearing in russian, ~swearing in polish, ~swearing in french, ~swearing in turkish, ~swearing in italian, ~999 new sex positions, ~how to get girls, ~how to fuck up someone's day, ~how to fuck up your own day, ~how to scream in pain silently.
Also about the community it's very supportive in their own way apparently when a CS:GO player has a bad day the others will tell him to fuck off.
This is a great game.

Если хотите узнать про свою семью, то вам сюда. Здесь вы узнаете как здоровье вашей мамы.
A W E S O M E , G A M E !!!
It is a game that sucks you in and never leaves you

There are so many cheaters running around in this game and most of them don't ever get VAC banned, only game banned for a few days. 

The recent VAC update which aimed to fix the cheater issues by disabling third party programs while CS is running didn't fix anything. The cheaters are still running around more than ever and now you can't ex. stream the game or use nvidia geforce in the game because of this third party update. 

There are a lot of issues with this game, but the gameplay is fun. A lot of issues can be solved by playing on ex. Faceit or ESEA. 

It's fun, but there are so many issues with cheaters and third party blocking, so beware.

Ja, ich würde das Spiel weiterempfehlen, da es auch noch nach längerer Zeit viel Spaß bereitet. Jedoch muss man auch damit rechnen, in Matchmaking von Russen umgecheatet zu werden.
